name.jp: クロックワークスの破片

description.en: Quest Item: A piece of the land bearing a scar from the Clockworks War.
description.ar: Quest Item: A piece of the land bearing a scar from the Clockworks War.
description.br: (Quest) Um pedaço de terra com uma cicatriz da Guerra de Clockwork.
description.cns: 第2次时空毁灭者战争留下的遗迹碎片
description.fi: Quest Item: A piece of the land bearing a scar from the Clockworks War.
description.fil: Quest Item: A piece of the land bearing a scar from the Clockworks War.
description.fr: cicatrices de la 2ème guerre de Clockworks
description.id: Quest Item: A piece of the land bearing a scar from the Clockworks War.
description.it: Quest Item: A piece of the land bearing a scar from the Clockworks War.
description.jp: バブル平原の会戦で三市連合により破壊されたクロックワークスの破片「クロックワークスよ、我らが決戦兵器、ホープ・オブ・マドリガルの威力、その身をもって味わうがいい！撃て！！」（クエストアイテム）
description.kr: 2차 대 클락워크 전쟁이 남긴 상처 조각
description.nl: Quest Item: A piece of the land bearing a scar from the Clockworks War.
description.pl: Quest Item: A piece of the land bearing a scar from the Clockworks War.
description.ru: Ключевой предмет: клочок земли, истерзанной войной.
description.sp: Objeto de Misión: Un trozo de tierra con una cicatriz de la Guerra de Clockworks.
description.sw: Quest Item: A piece of the land bearing a scar from the Clockworks War.
description.th: Quest Item: ชิ้นส่วนของดินแดนที่มีรอยแผลเป็นจาก Clockworks War
description.tw: 任務道具：一塊帶有時空毀滅者傷疤的土地。
description.vi: Vật phẩm nhiệm vụ: Một mảnh đất mang dấu vết Cuộc chiến tranh Clockworks.
